name: angular-squire
description: angularjs directive for squire rich text editor

scripts.build_icons: rm -f src/icons.js && for f in src/icons/*.svg; do basename=${f/src\/icons\//}; echo "export const ${basename/.svg/} = \`$(cat $f)\`;" >> src/icons.js; done
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass src/angular-squire.scss dist/angular-squire.css && npm run build_icons && npm run build_template && node_modules/babel/bin/babel.js src --stage 0 --out-dir dist && cp src/angular-squire.scss dist/
scripts.watch: npm run build_icons && npm run build_template && echo 'export default `'"$(node_modules/html-minifier/cli.js --collapse-whitespace src/template.html)"'`;' > src/template.js & ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass -w src/angular-squire.scss dist/angular-squire.css & node_modules/babel/bin/babel.js src --stage 0 --watch --out-dir dist
